participant_1.background:
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
i like to eat the skin of the apple.
I sometimes worry about my cats' safety when I'm on tour.

participant_2.background:
I loved reading books with my parents at the library during summer.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I'd brag about my famous Harry Potter knowledge to my friends.
i have 5 grandchildren.
Social media is not my thing.

content.text: I have loved reading since I was a child. I would spend hours at the library with my parents, and I would always come home with a stack of books.
That sounds like a great childhood! I loved reading books with my parents at the library during the summer.
Do you have a favorite book?
I have a few, but my favorite is probably Harry Potter. I love the magic, the characters, and the story.
Harry Potter is a great series! I have read all of them multiple times.
Me too! I love the books, but I also love the movies.
I have not seen the movies yet. I want to read the books again first.
That's a good idea. The books are better than the movies, in my opinion.
I'm glad you think so. I'm going to read them again soon.
